WorkItem.Description:
This leg enchant seems to be missing from the list, so every time I load my character from Armory it thinks they're unenchanted.
File attached: Lucifel.

Comments.Message: That one is probably being filtered by the Inscription profession filter, since that was set to hide based on the word "Master". Switch a profession to it to see if it shows up, if it does, turn off Enforce Profession Requirements and it won't be filtered out normally.

Just looked into the code, added a check to ensure that it doesn't get accidentally filtered by Inscription anymore and found out that it actually wasn't in our enchant database at all, added it (will filter on Tailoring profession).
